data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My aunt is a flight attendant, and she has been working for the same airlines for 20 years. She ____ that ____ enjoys ____ job, especially ____ she ____ to ____ the ____. The ____ thing ____ doesn't ____ is ____ passengers ____ too ____. She says they are hard to deal with.
data.partBlankContent: My aunt is a flight attendant, and she has been working for the same airlines for 20 years. She sa__ that s__ enjoys h__ job, especially si___ she ge__ to tra___ the wo___. The on__ thing s__ doesn't li__ is wh__ passengers g__ too dr___. She says they are hard to deal with.
data.fullContent: My aunt is a flight attendant, and she has been working for the same airlines for 20 years. She says that she enjoys her job, especially since she gets to travel the world. The only thing she doesn't like is when passengers get too drunk. She says they are hard to deal with.
data.answer: 我的阿姨是一名空中乘务员，她在同一家航空公司工作了20年。她说她喜欢她的工作，尤其是她可以周游世界。她唯一不喜欢的就是乘客喝醉了。她说，他们很难对付。
